Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Hi @Lumbi , I had that when my node went down big time.

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: I was suggested to `-reindex`, `reboot`, and then `You can also try -reindex-chainstate`.  I wanted to reboot anyhow, so did that.  Next time I'd try the  `-reindex-chainstate` frst.

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Certainly didn't want to `-reindex` KMD unless it was the final option.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: dont reboot the server until you have stopped all daemons with the stop RPC. 😃

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: If a daemon is not stopping with the stop RPC, then that is a bug and I need to be told about it please.

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Ahh, yes, that's what caused my crash!

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: is there a command to send max balance of asset coin to self?

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: or send balance ?

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: `./komodo-cli sendtoaddress <ADDRESS> $(./komodo-cli getbalance) "" "" true`

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: I use that to send to self.  Maybe someone else has a better way?

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
```chain=MYCHAIN
toAddy=someaddy
komodo-cli -ac_name=$chain sendtoaddress $toAddy $(komodo-cli -ac_name=$chain getbalance) "" "" true```

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Thanks, @ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢 👍

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: thanks both

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: if you don't make install and instead use komodo-cli from src dir with `./`, don't forget to add it in both places

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: hard fork version will be released in june, activation end of june or early july

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: Awesome, thanks. So the pubkeys and information will be needed by early june?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: also, in the event that a candidate without any proven record of notarizations (past mainnet, testnet) gets elected, they need to prove they can before beginning of June, or lose their spot

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so far, this is not an issue yet, but just wanted to be clear about that. it is possible that the first runnerup or even second will get the spot if we have a couple such winning candidates

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: If elected then I pledge 10% or more of all of my KMD rewards will be put towards KMD Discord community game prizes, most specifically towards regularly scheduled Discord Chat trivia session winners and host(s).

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: Open to suggestions as to just when and with what frequency trivia events will be held. Have seen many formats work, things can become particularly interesting with 'special' guest hosts..

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: i.e. Math trivia night.. I probably should not be the one to host this particular trivia session 😁 Seems there are plenty of number crunchers around here who could have a field day with some math trivia / challenges though.

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: Thanks for all of the support / assistance from so many of you current NN operators! Super cool group here and I hope to become a meaningful part of it for a long time to come.
